page.description: This syntax allows you to create a tabbed control that accepts embedded dialogs.
page.syntax: [%R= Lines %. Width, Height Current_Pane ^^ Pane_List { ButtonDef1,...ButtonDefN } [ ! Event ][ ? Enabled ] ]

argument.name: Lines
argument.description: Numeric. The number of lines to insert at top.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

argument.name: Height
argument.description: Numeric. The height of the control.

argument.name: Current_Pane
argument.description: Numeric. Indicates the number of the pane currently displayed.

argument.name: Pane_List
argument.description: Character. A CR-LF delimited list of dialog box contents ( %dlg% ... %dlg,<<%code% ... %code% ).
